game.name: Samurai Sword
game.description:
The game Samurai Sword shows that Samurai still have their presence among of us. Sword was used by these highly courageous and traditional warriors as a most common equipment to kill their enemies and protect their honour. That equipment is also denoted as a symbol of their determination, devotion, honor and strength. These legendary warriors roamed from one country to another while following the Bushido Code of Conduct, which is referred as the Way of the Warrior.

The unreal things these servants of the imperial army could do with their swords helped them to grab the attention of people around. That is why they are known as the major icons of true warriors. Get a chance to play with these renowned warriors in this electrifying and challenging 3D free online action-packed game for boys. Revive the story and allow yourself to bring you closer to them in a bit changed fighting environment.

Play the role of an elite soldier of Samurai army and take all your opponents down with the exclusive version of the samurai “lightsaber” before you meet the death. A young and energetic Japanese warrior, roofs of skyscrapers in the city. Get yourself ready to face light katana and masked enemies in this brand new fighting game. Apply all your fighting skills and show the world that you are also a true action champion in this one of the best fighting games 3d. Good luck boys!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Samurai Sword at atmegame.com ! We have selected this fighting games for best excitement and thrill in you!
